original_title: Global Tamil Forum, monks, meet Sri Lanka’s president
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – The Global Tamil Forum (GTF) and prominent Buddhist monks met President Ranil Wickremesinghe and presented the Joint Himalayan Declaration, the president’s media department said in a statement.
The Joint Himalayan Declaration advocates for a pluralistic Sri Lanka that promotes the well-being of all communities.
“Emphasizing the importance of learning from the nation’s historical missteps, the declaration underscores the necessity for implementing measures that ensure accountability,” the PMD said.

The monks (Sangha Sansadaya) for a better Sri Lanka said that after handing over this publication to the President, they will discuss it with the chief prelates of the three sects and inform other religious leaders about this as well. (Colombo/Dec8/2023)
